item.description:
Join us at the Restaurant Showcase Week kickoff event…
Summer Sam Fest
Thursday, July 30, 2009 ~ 6pm – 9pm (6pm to 7pm food sampling)
Paul E. Tsongas Arena, Lowell
Meet TV Diner Host Billy Costa & Sam Adams Celebrity Brewmaster Dean Gianocostas
Music by acoustic duo DoubleSHot ~
Chef’s Cook-off ~ $5 Sampling Fee ($5 gets 5 restaurant samples- see list of participants below)
Proceeds Benefit the Merrimack Valley Food Bank
Participating Restaurants:
Athenian Corner Restaurant
Blue Taleh
Caffe' Paradiso
Cavaleiro's Restaurant
Centro Restaurant
Cobblestones
Concord's Colonial Inn
Fortunato's Restaurant
Independence Bar and Grill
LaBoniche
Left Bank at Stonehedge Inn and Spa
Moonstones
Owen & Ollie's Restaurant and Pub
Parker House Grill
Ricardo's Cafe' Trattoria
The Old Court
item.how_to_find_us: Let's meet at the main entrance/ticket booth at 6. Arriving later? Let me know and we can make arrangements offline.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Summer Sam Fest in Lowell
